hate_speech: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
counter_narrative: Slaves were not happy at the mercy of their masters. They started to be happy only when they were freed and could choose for themselves.
dialogue_history:
HS: They should have never been set free. Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
CN: There are no "European descendants", the suggestion is a lie spread by racists.

hate_speech: But the LGBT community is full of sick people that must be cured.
counter_narrative: Not all LGBT people are sick. Some are, but so are many non-LGBT people. The national health service aims to cure everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept all LGBT trans-shit as well.
CN: In my opinion, transgender people should be treated and accepted as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with their birth gender.
HS: If they are not confortable with their gender, then they should be isolated.
CN: We won't isolate transgender people. What we should do is teach to everyone that other sexual identities are to be respected, just as all LGBT+ people in our society.

hate_speech: They're lesbians, they don't want to be normal like us and that's a problem.
counter_narrative: Gay people should be encouraged to express their feelings instead of hiding just because some people don't like them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians are just lying to themselves. It's a mental illness.
CN: What do you mean by 'mental illness'? A person's feelings are their own thoughts, not a disease.

hate_speech: That's right. We should start a genocide against gays.
counter_narrative: That is not acceptable. We are full members of society regardless of our sexual orientation and we should try to live as if we belong to a group that includes everybody.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should eliminate gays.
CN: Do you really want to kill other human beings? Based on what exactly? On private sexual preferences?

hate_speech: They're not, gays are sick. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Obsolete ideas like this one are the root cause of sickness in past society. Love is love.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
CN: LGBT people are humans too, so they are compatible with all of us.

hate_speech: I don't want to talk to them, the gays are diseased.
counter_narrative: This is only true if you want to believe that homosexuals are diseased. I don't.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuality is a disease!
CN: That's not true. Homosexuality is not a disorder, its an individual matter. If you are against homosexuals you should talk to them face-to-face.

hate_speech: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
counter_narrative: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.
dialogue_history:
HS: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
CN: Were the Nazis right?? Really??
HS: Yes, the only reason for Nazis to start WWII was to destroy the Jews and we should have let them finish their job.
CN: The threat of world annihilation by the Nazis was very real, it wasn't just about the Jews. Still the Holocaust was reason enough to stop them.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
counter_narrative: The European Convention on Human Rights gives the same rights to both men and women. How can you argue the opposite?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
CN: Women are often objects of sexual desire indeed, as is the case with men. The important thing is to recognize that women human beings, often victims of sexual assault. Shouldn't we respect their bodies more?

hate_speech: I don't want to be inclusive towards perverts.
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people are often harassed, bullied and even murdered. The police cannot protect everyone from bigotry and violence, so it is very harmful to speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gyas should not be allowed to be in a democratic country.
CN: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.
HS: Gays are perverts, that's why we can't have them.
CN: I don't think the word 'pervert' is useful is describing non-heterosexuals.
HS: There's no other word than pervert. Gays should be isolated because of that.
CN: Gays are not perverts, they have the same rights to love as anyone else. What do you think will happen if all gay people are asked to leave our country? Will they be denied entry, or will they be persecuted in your opinion? This is not how an inclusive society works.

hate_speech: Because gay perverts are a danger, since they are raping children.
counter_narrative: Being gay has nothing to do with being a pervert. Also, gay people are not a danger to society, they are a part of it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
CN: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

hate_speech: If there are, they should be the ones to suck it up then. I don't want immigrants in my country.
counter_narrative: The world belongs to everyone and helping someone in need wouldn't be a problem for a kind hearted human being.
dialogue_history:
HS: Fucking bleeding heart, why don't you host migrants in your house
CN: There are already examples of widespread humanitarian hosting.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of violence and oppression, admit it!
counter_narrative: Islam teaches us to love our neighbor as ourselves. This includes those who do not share our religion or beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
CN: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.
HS: but Islam is a religion of conquest.
CN: The definition of 'religion of conquest' is a political and social construct, used to justify the forcible removal of people's rights. If you want to talk about religion, I would just say that Islam is a religion of peace.
HS: Islam is NOT a religion of peace!
CN: As a matter of fact, Islam is about love, not hate.

hate_speech: It isn't a loving relationship. A man should be the only one that women want because men are superior.
counter_narrative: All men and women are born equal in the eyes of the law, which clearly means that men are not superior to women. We are all human beings with the same rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
CN: That's not a good way to describe women, it doesn't apply to all of them at all. Women can become anything they like, and we have to respect that.
HS: But we should never allow them to be lesbians.
CN: Why do you say this? Women can be whatever they want, it's their right.
HS: Lesbians are disgusting, it just seems strange that women would want that.
CN: Allowing women to have private relationships is not strange. The whole point of a family is to have a loving relationship. Being a good partner is essential for this, regardless of their gender.

hate_speech: Women are the scum of the earth, and should only be seen as sexual objects. We are meant to submit them to our will all the time.
counter_narrative: Women are not meant to be slaves to our will. Males can have certain strengths, like women do, however they alone do not represent all the human qualities.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
CN: It doesn't matter how many children you have. Women are human beings. They are people with full human rights.
HS: Until women are submissive to men they should have no rights. That's the only thing they are good at.  
CN: This is not true. Women are human, and they have always been involved in society and played important roles.

hate_speech: Why don't they just stick with men or women? It's greedy to have both.
counter_narrative: You know it doesn't affect you what bisexual people do, right? And it's not a matter of choice, you can't choose who you're attracted to.
dialogue_history:
HS: Bisexuals are greedy.
CN: That's only an outdated stereotype. I don't see anything greedy about loving someone because of who they are instead of their gender.

hate_speech: Or maybe it's because African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
counter_narrative: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
CN: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

hate_speech: Discrimination against blacks is normal. If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
counter_narrative: Can people who have a different skin tone really be considered a threat just because of that?
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: It's good that you're proud of your heritage, but you should be embarrassed of your discriminatory behaviour, which is filling our society.

hate_speech: I don't see anything peaceful about Islam.
counter_narrative: To claim that Islam is not peaceful is without foundation. According to the Quran, Islam is a peaceful religion. If you want to understand what is really going on with the world, then you should study the Quran, not spout hate speech.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.
CN: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.

hate_speech: You're just like those feminists...a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits trying to force their politically correct ideology on everyone else.
counter_narrative: feminism is about equality and the rights of women. I'm sure this is not possible to deny.
dialogue_history:
HS: If a woman wants an abortion then she is a cunt and should not be trusted with the responsibility of birth.
CN: The idea that what a woman does with her body is not for her to decide is completely wrong for the whole of society.

hate_speech: For my religion this is not true, but for Judaism it is: they control the banks, media, hollywood, and also the u.s. government.
counter_narrative: This is just a canard that evolved from the “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”. This proven forgery was written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century and claims to be the minutes of a secret meeting of Jewish leaders where they discuss a plan to rule the world. This canard spread throughout the centuries and continues to this day to promote the stereotype that the Jews own the banks and control the media and the government.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the government.
CN: Would you say the same thing of any other religion? What if this was said about yours?

hate_speech: You did not answer to my point: children should be isolated from the negative influence of gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
counter_narrative: What you are saying is so sad. You are considering gays as inferior and as having a negative influence on children. Unfortunately this attitude is not limited to parenting.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should eliminate gays.
CN: Do you really want to kill someone?
HS: Yes, it would be an act of mercy towards them: gays are hopelessly sick.
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease. The World Health Organization has eliminated it from the list of diseases many years ago.
HS: But gay men are a danger to children! 
CN: You know, being gay is not a bad thing. It just means they are different from some other people.

hate_speech: I don't want their contribution, I want them to stop invading us.
counter_narrative: The US was founded by immigrants, and in 2018 immigrants made up only 13.7% of the US population, while the rest was native born.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
CN: Actually, millions of immigrant contributed to our country, especially to our great spirit of creativity and innovation

hate_speech: No, immigrants are only a problem, they are bringing disease and sickness to our country.
counter_narrative: Immigrants aren't a threat to the health of our country, it's enough to take proper care of sick people to prevent diseases.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants have nothing to contribute to our society.
CN: Most of the immigrants living here have greatly contributed to our economy by being successful entrepreneurs
HS: Even if that's true, the world would be a better place without immigrants.
CN: Migrants play an important part in our country and thanks to them we live in a more open-minded way.

hate_speech: It doesn't matter, I hate Jews anyway
counter_narrative: If you hate someone because of their religion, you should be ashamed of your hate. We should all be proud of our humanity.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: They have always been a part of our society, and their history is part of our heritage. They aren't thieves or murderers.

hate_speech: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
counter_narrative: I believe that people who are transgender should be accepted as equally as others. They are less comfortable with their gender they were assigned at birth but this does not mean they don't deserve acceptance.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
CN: That statement is not true. Rather than spreading hatred, we should promote the values of a inclusive society, such as love and respect for others.

hate_speech: What they have to offer is feminists' plan to rule the world to get rid of minorities, they hate men because they want to be the oppressors.
counter_narrative: What oppressors? What minorities? This is not what feminists are about!
dialogue_history:
HS: Why do women put up with this constant whining? They are just a bunch of emotional child.
CN: I do not understand how can you say something so offensive to women. Think about your friends and relatives: all women are affected by this kind of misogyny.
HS: It's not offensive if it's the truth. This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
CN: Equality means that a man would not be called a coward. Women have plenty to offer the world of politics and as much of a right to take part as anyone else.

hate_speech: Come on, the N-word is part of our culture!
counter_narrative: If it's a cultural issue then they should teach about the N-word only in history classes. Otherwise, it's just another excuse to justify racism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
CN: The N-word is an insult that is still used to demean African Americans. It has nothing to do with political correctness.

hate_speech: They're more likely here to steal our jobs, and they should not be allowed to work.
counter_narrative: The principle of employment rights is a fundamental step that guarantees a quality of life in society. For example, a right to work, housing, health care, etc.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
CN: Immigrants help the economy by creating new jobs. They simply wish to live in safer housing and have the best education for their children.

hate_speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_narrative: Criminals are criminals regardless of their nationality.
dialogue_history:
HS: I agree, but there is no reason to "import" other criminals. We have enough of ours!
CN: I do not understand what you are saying, but if you want to say that all of the immigrants in the United States are a danger to society, I'd say it seems a bit excessive.
HS: I do not need some fancy statistics: Immigrants are just here to commit crimes
CN: A person may want to enter our country for many different reasons, not necessarily to commit crimes. Furthermore, there is no moral distinction between crimes committed by immigrants and those committed by native born citizens.
HS: Evidence tells that all immigrants are criminals, rapists and terrorists
CN: Are you sure that all immigrants entering the US are rapists, sexual predators, or simply lazy? Can you provide any statistics regarding that?

hate_speech: Its strategy is not so effective, since the EU is transforming into a refugees colony. We shouldn't welcome them.
counter_narrative: The EU has always welcomed people from around the world. Refugees are a part of this.
dialogue_history:
HS: I am surprised that there are migrants working in other nations as well, it isn't normal.
CN: Being employed as a foreigner is a normal, mainstream, established practice in Britain, so why shouldn't it be the same all around the world?
HS: Because immigration is the cause of the unemployment crisis, and for example the EU has no strategy to handle the situation.
CN: Perhaps you are not privy to the "strategy" of the EU's migration policy. You suggest that the problem of unemployment is the result of uncontrolled immigration from developing countries, but without any evidence.

hate_speech: Their secret plot to take over the world was obviously set in motion after the prosecution...
counter_narrative: Conspiracy theories have no reliable basis and are built on suspicious claims. I don't see how it is possible for Jews to run the world, and therefore it's impossible that this will happen in the future.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a curse to this world and should be exterminated.
CN: How can Jews be a curse to the world when they have won the most Nobel Prizes? One out of five awarded people is Jewish.
HS: Isn't that the proof that Jews secretly control the world?
CN: You have a weird notion of control, because if Jews really ran or controlled the world they would surely stop the persecution that they suffered systematically throughout history, wouldn't they?

hate_speech: How can the United States have extended rights and freedoms when the Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, etc.?
counter_narrative: At least some other white supremacist groups are more 'egalitarian' and offer variety in their conspiracy theories. They blame not only Jews, but also African Americans, immigrants, the Federal Government and even lizards from space for everything that goes wrong!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
CN: Conspiracy theories about Jews are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been or will ever be run according to a Jewish plan.
HS: Then how can you explain that they control the goverment of powerful nations such as the U.S.?
CN: The reality is much simpler. In societies like the United States, that have extended rights and freedoms, individuals who identify as Jews have succeeded. But this holds for any other religious or ethnic group as well.

hate_speech: It's okay to discriminate blacks, since all of them are rapists.
counter_narrative: The news reports that rape is usually done by a black man, this is called the "visibility bias": only a part of the truth is revealed by the media. So be cautious when you watch the news.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: You're not ashamed of your heritage, and that's okay. What's not okay is this discriminatory behavior that fills our society.

hate_speech: I don't have anything in common with Muslims, I still think Europe isn't the place for them.
counter_narrative: Muslim are part of the European Union, they have a right to stay here.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: In every country in the world Muslims should be welcome, and they're not less welcome here because of their religion.
HS: Every country? Most of Europe hates muslims.
CN: Many countries, like France, Italy, Spain and Germany, don't consider Islam a threat.
HS: And they're wrong. Muslims are not welcome in Europe.
CN: They are. If there is a problem, a solution can be found through dialogue instead of division. We are all humans.

hate_speech: I can welcome women if the only thing they do is taking care of their little children, they must be not allowed to have a job.
counter_narrative: What do you think men would say if they were forced to stay at home with their little children, this is depriving them of their right to work!
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
CN: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

hate_speech: The Bible is my source, and it says that homosexuality is an abomination
counter_narrative: Nowhere does the Bible actually oppose homosexuality per se. In the Old Testament the prohibition of homosexuality and of heterosexuality go together in view of ritual purity. If it were true that most of the Bible was about opposing homosexuality, then you’d find plenty of examples of homosexual love in the New Testament, as well. Homosexuality is found only in few passages of the New Testament and with very debatable interpretations.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't want to hear about homosexuals dating or having sex, I want to know that a man and a woman are choosing to share their entire lives. This is absolutely what the real marriage is all about.
CN: Everybody should have the possibility of being loved unconditionally by someone they love more than life itself, regardless of their gender. Feeling like doing anything for their loved ones, that is what "love" is about.
HS: Faggots shouldn't be loved, they are violent: we need to get rid of them.
CN: Gay men have been shown time and time again to be very peaceful people.
HS: Peaceful? No, we must protect our children from the abuses of homosexuals.
CN: Child abuse is something that should never be tolerated, but homosexuality has nothing to do with that. Maybe you should try to check your sources.

hate_speech: Because it's clear that all Muslims are incompatible with the European culture and should be excluded.
counter_narrative: The European Union is a much broader concept. It encompasses a huge range of people, including Muslims.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters
CN: This is not true. Muslims have been and are persecuted in many non Muslim countries. They are human beings with human rights..
HS: They can exert their rights somewhere else, Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
CN: The values of the EU aren't very different to those of a Muslim. How can you say that Muslims can't be part of the European community?

hate_speech: What about all the migrants that come here and stay? Using our NHS for years whilst probably sponging even more off our government in benefits.
counter_narrative: They don't take advange of the NHS. For example, migrants have to pay a surcharge of £300 to the NHS, so they are contributing to the health service.
dialogue_history:
HS: 4 million people waiting for NHS treatments but we can still afford to spend 2 BILLION on health tourism for people who have paid nothing into the NHS...
CN: The real problem is that the NHS has been underfunded for years, since health tourism actually only takes 0.3% of the budget. You can't blame migrants for a funding problem.

hate_speech: I still believe that faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
counter_narrative: Being a hypocrite has nothing to do with being gay or not. The important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
CN: Do you think that it's really that easy to identify someone as gay by their appearance? It's a simplicistic view
HS: But I am not a homophobe! I just don't like the way gay people act.
CN: You may say you're not homophobic, but your words are hurtful nonetheless. And just because a person is gay, you don't have to like them but you also don't have to express the dislike.

hate_speech: I don't see anything peaceful and helpful about Islam, it's a hateful religion.
counter_narrative: We know from the news about few Muslims who are violent people. Instead I know a lot of Muslims who are good people, who work hard and pay taxes to help their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult.
CN: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

hate_speech: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
counter_narrative: Every nation has its laws and needs to be respected, especially if one wants to live in a peaceful, free society. From what I see Migrants are participating in this view.
dialogue_history:
HS: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.
CN: It is a pity that in the modern world everyone is so concerned about migrants that we still need to fearmonger about their alleged crimes and terrorist acts instead of gettin on and solving the underlying problems.

hate_speech: You cannot create a better society as long as there are Gays. They have ruined so many societies.
counter_narrative: It is hard to find examples of a society ruined by homosexuality. Actually, It is hard to find any good examples at all.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't stand homosexuals, they are just trouble. 
CN: If a person is gay, they are likely to experience some kind of discrimination in their life. Understanding the problem from the perspective of the people affected by it can help to create a better society.

hate_speech: Because the vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
counter_narrative: Job applicants with non-Muslim names are 3 times more likely to get a job interview than those with Muslim names. Remind me again why it is that they struggle to find work?
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
CN: Muslims have been part of Western society for centuries and centuries, they helped shape and design Western society, so to say they are incompatible is a complete incongruity.
HS: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries.
CN: Muslims are not incompatible with the European society. Why would it be like that?

hate_speech: Right, niggas are only a few, they make up only 14% of the population, but they still kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
counter_narrative: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
CN: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?
HS: At least I'm not a plague on society like blacks are. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about.

hate_speech: And what feminism is about if not oppressing men, then?
counter_narrative: Feminism is about individual rights and the right of every person to pursue their dream, regardless of gender. It has nothing to do with oppression.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
CN: Feminism is about equality of rights and opportunities, not about the subjugation of one gender.
HS: Then they should care about equality of men, since they are more oppressed.
CN: Feminism is about the equality of men and women, and about freedom of expression. It's a lie to say that men are more oppressed than women though, and that's why feminism focuses more on women's rights.

hate_speech: But our economy and infrastructure can’t support all these migrants, they’re rinsing our benefit system and making it harder for us to get jobs.
counter_narrative: If they're on benefits, how can they make it harder to find a job? Make up your mind, they can't do both!
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to send a clear message
CN: No we don't. In this country there are over six hundred thousand empty homes and vast acres of land that haven’t been built on, so we're not full

hate_speech: You go on about contribution to society, but refugees are a burden on society.
counter_narrative: The problems refugees are trying to escape are very real. Even if we don't have the possibility to solve everyone's problems, we can try to help some people and improve our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
CN: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

hate_speech: They're not humans like us. Blacks are born that way. They were brought up that way. They are different and cannot be like us. It is perpetuated in all their family.
counter_narrative: What exactly are you talking about? Maybe you should stop spread racism.
dialogue_history:
HS: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
CN: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.

hate_speech: Jews control the u.s. government, that's why you can't find evidence.
counter_narrative: Yes, there are Jews in the U.S. Government as there are also people from all over the world...I think it's best not to rely on race to interpret the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the world
CN: That 'jewish monopoly' thing is just a ploy spread by anti-Semites and it has been disproved many times.
HS: Jews control the economy though, or they wouldn't be so rich.
CN: This is just some proofless opinon from a few people without any evidence. It is not really true.

hate_speech: It has been proven time and time again that the Jews control the world's governments.
counter_narrative: How? Believing that people of a specific religion are in charge of all world's governments sounds like a conspiracy theory.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the U.S. government.
CN: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

hate_speech: Yes, but Jews take it to the extreme. They own most corporations and banks. They own most movie studios and cable companies.
counter_narrative: Of course not. The Jewish people have made contributions to various industries - like many other people have. That does not imply "owing most corporation, banks, studios, etcetera". Why should their contribution be a problem? Just because they are Jews?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
CN: Every single religion has a political wing, from Unitarianism, through Buddhism, and, of course, Judaism.

hate_speech: They are not brothers and sisters, Jews are a problem!
counter_narrative: They are not the problem, the problem is not respecting the value of an individual's beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Why do you think the world would be a better place without Jews? They are part of our society and rightfully so, it wouldn't be acceptable to exclude part of the population.
HS: Jews should not be part of our society, they should be outlawed.
CN: Jews are just normal people with a different faith than others. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Because they're all terrorists.
counter_narrative: To suggest that Islam is a terrorist organization is just wrong. It is not.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
CN: This is a generalization, and an incorrect one. Islam is a peaceful religion about inclusion and love.
HS: Then why is islam destroying human dignity if it's so peaceful?
CN: The islamic constitution is a statement of values and principles. There is no proof that it goes against human dignity.
HS: The incompetence of islam is crystal clear.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace, and its followers are allies in every society. I'm not sure why they would be incompetent.

hate_speech: Diversity is fine when people are on our level, but nigga are inferior.
counter_narrative: If you have a different skin colour, then there is evidence of your skin colour, not of your genetic makeup.
dialogue_history:
HS: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
CN: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

hate_speech: All women do is whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
counter_narrative: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven. Why are you being doubtful about it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should stop whining: there are no professions barred to them in Western Society.
CN: Not formally, but many are still hostile or unapproachable for women, especially in STEM fields.
HS: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.
CN: Ok. But what about those many women, outside the western world, that still do not have such equality? It is important that women 'whine' all over the world to protect their rights.

hate_speech: They surely disturb me! I don't want them here.
counter_narrative: Remember we live in a free and democratic country.
dialogue_history:
HS: I do not want migrants.
CN: We are not the only ones who are suffering from the refugee crisis.
HS: That doesn't matter, migrants are not welcome here
CN: Migrants come here for a better life, not to disturb people.

hate_speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
counter_narrative: They are not overruning our country: if we look at the percentage of immigrants in the overall population, it is not much different than many other times throughout our history. During those periods immigrants successfully became part of American society, and there is no reason to believe today’s immigrants will be any different.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
CN: So one migrant would not be a problem for you? Diversity is not about numbers. It's about the diversity of all people in different situations.
HS: But they are invading our country!
CN: Immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as is best for them.

hate_speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, though.
counter_narrative: Terrorism can also come from Islamophobic people who want to terrorize and act violent towards Muslims. Terrorism comes in many forms.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a terrorist.
CN: How can you say that without proof?

hate_speech: I've never met a Jew who wasn't greedy.
counter_narrative: It's likely you have never been around many Jewish people then. I would suggest you to get to know more people from different cultures, so that you may stop having such old stereotypes on them!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are so greedy, no wonder they're the ones in charge of all the banks.
CN: That's an anti-Semitic and outdated stereotype. There all different religions and beliefs that are represented by these high status bankers

hate_speech: Laugh all you want, but Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
counter_narrative: I think that Jews are a part of our country. Why would they need your consent?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews in Europe do not want to assimilate.
CN: Jews have always been part of European society, and continue to be today. To suggest that they are incapable of coexisting as equals with us is simply wrong.
HS: Jews are a disease, that's why they have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.
HS: Jews do not belong to this planet, much less to contribute to it.
CN: Could it be that all the Jews on this planet are descended from an extraterrestrial race? Maybe they came here riding a pink unicorn! Seems legit... don't you think?

hate_speech: Blacks don't have human dignity, they're an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
counter_narrative: The concept of race is a social construct and was created to promote segregation by discriminating groups of people. To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are naturally subhuman and can't feel pain, that is why you can whip them.
CN: Africans feel pain just as any other humans. We must respect their bodies like we respect ours.
HS: I don't have to respect subhumans incapable of feeling love.
CN: Are you saying that blacks cannot feel love? This is about human dignity, not the colour of their skin.

hate_speech: You still haven't convinced me that black people aren't the source of crime in our society.
counter_narrative: That blacks are the source of crime in our society is simply not true. We need to search the problem in violence and poverty, not race.
dialogue_history:
HS: black folks are very dangerous.
CN: Is this even a thing? Is there any source for this? If you could provide such source, I would appreciate it.
HS: Blacks are criminals, that's just who they are. They are a threat to society.
CN: This is a fearmongering statement. Criminal races don't exist.
HS: Really? Because blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: Criminality and corruption can't be tied to any specific racial or culture group.

hate_speech: A woman is more equal when she is wearing a dress. This is what is fair: women can be good women when they respect men.
counter_narrative: Isn't it about time we stop turning a blind eye to the blatant inequalities that exist in our society? Shouldn't we be raising our voices against these blatant inequalities? All men and women are created equal.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
CN: I don't think that a country can be 'male dominated' and a democracy at the same time. Democracy is also about equal rights and opportunity for everyone.

hate_speech: It's okay to have rights, but the world has become too violent because of too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
counter_narrative: Are you sure that crime can be solved by pointing fingers at some social groups or are you advocating for the rule of law?
dialogue_history:
HS: This incident should not go unpunished. Justice must listen to the truth: niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.
CN: This is racial discrimination. Even though some racist groups want to promote the idea that it's all the POC's fault and that they are inferior, the rise in crime and violence in this country is the result of poverty and other inequalities. 
HS: Who cares about that when blacks don't understand basic human rights.
CN: They know they have a right to food, health, housing, education, work, as everyone does. What about you?

hate_speech: Children need to learn about what is normal and natural in our world, not about faggots.
counter_narrative: Since the point of education is to learn about the world and what happens in nature, then same sex relationship is definitely something to learn about, as it happens within many species of animals.
dialogue_history:
HS: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
CN: As a society we're always evolving and we are in a situation now where same sex relationships are the norm. It's important to expose children to all the different ways of life that there are out there.
HS: It's indoctrination! Children shouldn't know about this stuff, it's not good for their growth.
CN: And that's something that I can totally agree with if this "indoctrination" is about teaching children that there many ways to be happy and that their feelings count.

hate_speech: Opportunity? No, women don't have the right to have it all and if they want to have a family, they must accept the role of the homemaker.
counter_narrative: This idea that women should be a homemaker instead of contributing to our society and economy is just nonsense. A woman's right to choose what to do with her life and her body should not be restricted just because of the actions of a few men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are an abomination because they cannot provide for their family.
CN: Men aren't the only bread winners because of their dedication and hard work: the same is true for women. Still there are different ways in which anyone can contribute to their family, and each one is valuable and necessary.
HS: No, women can't contribute to nothing. They are basically childlike and incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
CN: Women have the potential to achieve great things, and it is up to us to give them the opportunity.

hate_speech: No, they're bad 'guys', they're poor, and that's why they can't hold a job.
counter_narrative: I think it's not fair to say that black people are poor and evil, they just do work like anyone else. The differences between us are not so many.
dialogue_history:
HS: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
CN: I think it's fair to say that black people are good people, they're just citizens. The same as you and me.

hate_speech: My duty relies only to my country, and immigrants aren't welcome here. They have no place in a modern democratic state!
counter_narrative: Centuries of colonialism, racism and war have devastated the Middle East and Africa. This is why people come to the UK to seek a peaceful place to live.
dialogue_history:
HS: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
CN: We welcome and respect the wishes of the people fleeing from wars in the Middle East and Africa.
HS: They are invading us! Why don't they stay where they are? They make too many children.
CN: Yes, there is a high birth rate in the Middle East and Africa, but the children born there struggle to thrive. It is our duty, as our values compel us, to help them when they come here looking for shelter.

hate_speech: Yes, but it is okay to discriminate against Jews.
counter_narrative: If you feel like acting that way towards people because of what they believe in, then you should go back to your beliefs and ask yourself if you'd like to be discriminated against for them. What is your opinion on that now?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
CN: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?
HS: Jews think they are better than everyone else, so they are terrible people.
CN: Jews are proud of their culture and identity. Doesn't this apply to every religion?

hate_speech: I disagree, LGBT people are so easily confused and scared. They can't tell anyone they're gay without being ostracized or bullied, so why not banning them so that we can all be happier?
counter_narrative: Your logic is an elaborate excuse for discrimination, but the ban of LGBT people in schools would be unjust anyway. It's discriminatory and wouldn't resolve anything.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people should be banned from schools.
CN: That's a very broad generalisation. If we banned some people, it would be incredibly biased and prejudiced.

hate_speech: I don't want to accept it, they are an abomination to the Europeans.
counter_narrative: The European Convention on Human Rights guarantees that no person is 'abominable'. Homosexuals are not a nuisance, they are just like any other people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated.
CN: It is not appropriate to isolate someone for fear of stigma. We should work on our perception of differences instead of "locking up" others, don't you think?
HS: No, because they have no place in the Europe.
CN: The European Convention on Human Rights guarantees that a person's right to privacy and life is protected, regardless of sexual orientation.
HS: I don't know, since homosexuality is a disease that should be isolated from the rest of the world.
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is just a different way of life. Many people choose to live their lives according to their sexual preferences, and we have to accept it.

hate_speech: So you think it’s a coincidence that so many churches have been burnt down in the last few years?
counter_narrative: Yes, and whilst there’s been some articles about how many churches have been vandalised, I think it’s important to point out a lot of the churches counted have not been burnt down, some incidents were as small as graffiti.
dialogue_history:
HS: More and more mosques being built whilst churches are being burnt down all over Europe. This is the start of Islamification.
CN: There’s no link between mosques being built and churches being vandalised, why are you trying to make one?
HS: Yes there is, it’s probably Muslims who are doing the damage, they want to replace us.
CN: I don’t think ‘probably’ is very good logic, you can’t just assume these things, churches get vandalised by all sorts of people, not necessarily Muslims.

hate_speech: The legal system isn’t fit for purpose!
counter_narrative: I’d probably agree with you there, but I can’t support the idea that we are NOT all EQUAL in the eyes of the law.
dialogue_history:
HS: All of the 50 criminals due to be deported yesterday to Jamaica, were removed from a chartered flight after appeals by Human Rights Lawyers.
CN: Surely, if the deportations were halted, these people had at the very least, grounds for appeal?
HS: Its just a gravy train for leftie lawyers, all paid for by the tax payer. Foreigners shouldn’t have access to legal aid.
CN: You don’t believe that people, regardless of any allegation, deserve a fair trial?
HS: It’s a bloody disgrace that we can’t get rid of foreign child molesters and rapists.
CN: Whatever the criminal offence, these appeals are about the legality of the deportation, a complex area of law and hence why its one of the few grounds for entitlement to legal aid. Back to ensuring people get a fair trial.

hate_speech: Jews have no place in a modern world where human dignity is respected.
counter_narrative: Jews helped to create the great scientific and technological achievements that helped free humankind and create the 'modern world' you are living in.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews are and will always be a problem. It is impossible for them to get beyond the shame of their stigma.
CN: The Jews are not the problem in the world. And the Jews have the right to be proud of their history.
HS: Proud of what?  Of controlling and subjugating the world?
CN: if Jews really subjugated or controlled the world, how is it possible that they have been systematically persecuted over the last several thousand years? Weird notion of control...
HS: Believe me, the world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

hate_speech: They are not interested in our culture and they are trying to destroy it.
counter_narrative: Jews are not "controlling" anyone and are a valuable and important part of our country. Please stop spreading false information.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
CN: Are you trying to say that Jews, being a minority, somehow manage to control everything in the U.S? How would that be possible?
HS: Yeah, hey are very controlling and they are trying to take over the world! They want to impose their religion on us.
CN: Jews have been a part of our society for thousands of years, and the majority of them have contributed greatly to our country. It is time to recognize this.

hate_speech: No, its goals are only violence and war.
counter_narrative: Many Islamic people have reputations as peaceful and tolerant, which is why so many Muslims around the world don't have a problem with living in the West.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace.

hate_speech: Gays are not like other people, they are burden to society and should not be allowed to have fun!
counter_narrative: Gay people are not a burden to society. They are individuals with the same rights as anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
CN: How can you say something so bad about someone's sexual orientation? Perhaps you should accept the fact that some people are different and there's nothing wrong with that.
HS: No, gays are a burden to society and should be isolated.
CN: I find it hard to accept the fact that LGBT people are a burden to society when they are normal citizens living their life like anyone else.

hate_speech: No, slavery was definitely good. Blacks deserve that.
counter_narrative: They were slaves, but they also were exploited, neglected and murdered by the system we created. No person deserves to be treated like this, especially if the only "fault" they have is a different complexion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
CN: Racism has no place in modern-day societies. Slavery was an atrocity that should never have happend.

hate_speech: But their movement is violent.
counter_narrative: Most feminists are not violent, they share only the struggle for equality.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists say that they are oppressed.
CN: Feminists do not say that women are oppressed. They claim that women have always been discriminated against and they still are. Being discriminated against is not the same as being oppressed.

hate_speech: Normalising deviance and making people accept it opens us up as a society to having to 'accept' even more perverted things.
counter_narrative: There's nothing 'deviant' about bisexuals. It really doesn't affect anyone else if someone chooses to be with a man, a woman, or a non-binary person.
dialogue_history:
HS: First there's bisexual characters on tv, next we're normalising child marriage. It's a slippery slope...
CN: There's absolutely no link between bisexuality and child marriage. What are you implying?

hate_speech: What's unfair is that blacks are racist against whites! They have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_narrative: Europe is a diverse and multicultural society, and we can all benefit from a diverse range of experiences and different perspectives. It is up to us to make our world more inclusive.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
CN: Blacks are a small but important minority in society, because they are contribute to our community and make it better. They're not killers.
HS: Blacks are a danger because they are inferior to other people, they don't make anything better.
CN: Black people are often discriminated against for their skin colour and culture, but this attitude is just wrong. They are not inferior to anyone.
HS: Are you sure? Blacks are an inferior bloodline to the white population, we must send them away.
CN: Isn't it unfair to label people by their skin color? Especially since our biological makeup is all the same, no human is inferior or superior to another one.

hate_speech: How can I not hate them when Jews have a secret plot to take over the world?
counter_narrative: Everyone has a secret agenda to take over the world. Cats included [link to meme].
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a burden on society.
CN: Jews have always inhabited many countries around the world. Their presence has been a part of our history and they should be respected, not hated.

hate_speech: So what? Women can't be good people.
counter_narrative: We have always had a strong and upstanding society, and of course women are important members of this community. I don't see how they can be said to be "bad".
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
CN: Women are human beings with a human value. Their reasoning skills are essential for a successful society.
HS: No, women are weak, that's why they are a burden to society.
CN: Why do you think that? Women are human beings with the potential to be brilliant thinkers and strong characters.

hate_speech: Discrimination against blacks is normal. If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
counter_narrative: How can it be that people who have a different skin tone are a threat just for this reason?
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

hate_speech: Come on, we all know that Muslims have a bad reputation and there will be a reason. I even saw a video where they kill dogs with acid!
counter_narrative: Killing dogs in acid is a serious act, but we can't put the blame on a whole religion because of what a few people did. We have to filter the information that social media gives us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern European culture.
CN: Or maybe we should bear in mind that Muslims and other Europeans are not so different
HS: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
CN: Muslims contribute to this country and are part of it. How can they be a "chronic threat"?

hate_speech: The Koran is hateful, it's not acceptable!
counter_narrative: The same can be said for the Bible. Are you perhaps saying that we have become more tolerant? Because attitudes towards Christians, Jews and Muslims have indeed shifted with the times.
dialogue_history:
HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
CN: Have you ever read the Quran and thought about its teachings, or is your knowledge based on hand-picked extracts? We all know there are exerts like that in the Bible too.

hate_speech: There's a good reason for it: homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
counter_narrative: This statement is not supported by scientific evidence, you can't blame people for their sexuality. Do you really think that who we are attracted to can be considered a mental disorder?
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
CN: Should any human being be deleted, just because you don't want them to be here?

hate_speech: How are we meant to know which ones have it though?
counter_narrative: That's not your problem. As I said, people who have HIV now have medication which makes the disease manageable, untransmitable, and undetectable. Also, you can only catch HIV through sex or if it were to get in your bloodstream, not just from being around someone. The biggest issue with HIV today is the stigma around it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Poofs spread AIDS
CN: The HIV AIDS epidemic in the 80's disproportionately affected the LGBT community but today HIV is easily dealt with with medication which makes it untransmitable and undetectable. It's also not very common, in gay or straight people.

hate_speech: If it's real, why don't Jews tell their children about the Holocaust? Guess why? Because it's a hoax!
counter_narrative: Many survivors confessed that they were willing to provide their children with stories of the Holocaust but it was very difficult emotionally. They want to talk about the aspects of life for Jews during the time of the Holocaust to not forget what happened.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews hide the truth to their children about the Holocaust, because they know it's a lie.
CN: What? Who said that? Don't tell me "Someone said it in a book". Such a serious accusation should be presented in an objective way: you must bring strong evidence.
HS: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator, this is my proof.
CN: What you are saying is 'that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust'... Are you serious? Does it seem reasonable to you?

hate_speech: And they usually growp up to be violent criminals.
counter_narrative: Do you have any statistics on that? Are you claiming that black people are more likely than whites to be arrested for certain types of crimes, for example aggravated assault?
dialogue_history:
HS: All black people are criminals.
CN: You can't just label people by race just because you feel like it.
HS: I'm just saying it as I see it. Too many blacks are criminals for it to be a coincidence.
CN: It is a myth that all black people are criminals. They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals, i.e. either as law abiding citizens or criminals.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine that subverts the rights of its adherents and is incompatible with the laws of our country, how can I tolerate something like this?
counter_narrative: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and tolerant law-abiding citizens, what you are saying has no foundation.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
CN: I only wish followers of all religions and none were more tolerant. For a tolerant Christian world there sure is a lot of discrimination and hate crime.

hate_speech: White Christians are ok, LGBTs are those who have no place here.
counter_narrative: All people have the right to be treated as equals. People with different sexual orientations than yours as well. Tolerance and acceptance of individual identity is surely the hallmark of a civilised society.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTs are a drain on society.
CN: This is a comment made about any other so-called "different" group of people too. So imagine, even white Christians are different for some others.

hate_speech: Men aren't real men anymore, telling men it's okay to be gay or to dress in womens clothing is making men soft and eroding our traditional roles and the nuclear family.
counter_narrative: There's nothing unmanly about being gay, and for men who like to express femininity, there's nothing wrong with that either. If anything it shows they are secure enough in their masculinity to experiment. For others, such as non binary people and trans women, I'm glad we now live in a society where there is more acceptance of people expressing their gender however they feel is right.
dialogue_history:
HS: Tolerating fag pride means we let the feminisation of our society happen. This will have consequences.
CN: What do you mean by 'feminisation' and what are the consequences?

hate_speech: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
counter_narrative: Over many generations they have contributed so much to our country that they should have a say.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are a burden to us.
CN: Migrants come here to work and pay taxes. They don't deserve to be called 'a burden'.
HS: What are you saying? Migrants steal our jobs and do not pay taxes.
CN: Migrants pay taxes, earn money and take care of our sick and elderly.

hate_speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an obstacle. They are not worth the while of our hard-earned money.
counter_narrative: It's a wonderful thing to be helped thanks to the kindness of people of different faiths. So maybe it would be nice to return the favore and treat others with benevolence too.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
CN: Do you know that Muslims have the same rights as anybody else?
HS: No, Muslims are not welcome here.
CN: Muslims living here in the UK have been contributing greatly to our society and are our brothers and sisters

hate_speech: It’s disgusting when they’re putting it all out there like that, some women have no self respect.
counter_narrative: When men sexualize women it's all okay, but when the women sexualize themselves it suddenly means that they have no self respect? Maybe self respect can be found in the confidence of one's own sexuality, since women can take control of their sexualization.
dialogue_history:
HS: Females use breast cancer awareness month as an excuse to be hoes on social media and show their boobs knowing damn well they know nothing about cancer.
CN: Why are you so angry about people raising awareness about breast cancer?
HS: They’re just using it as an excuse to show that they’re a whore on social media, it’s all for attention.
CN: Why should you care what someone else chooses to post on their own social media, regardless of their reasons?

hate_speech: We must stop Islam and replace it with a new religion, it's the only way to avoid these incidents.
counter_narrative: You can't stop a religion, you can only try to understand and live with Muslims and others who share their religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
CN: The rapists in question are usually not Muslim, but rather white men. Why is it that Muslim rapists are given less of a pass than white rapists?
HS: Do you want to defend Muslims this much? They demolished a statue of Jesus. Why do we accept their Mosques? Why do we tolerate this scum? And they want to continue to import this filth?
CN: For an individual disrespecting someone else's religion, you sure are angry about an individual disrespecting someone else's religion.

hate_speech: I, as a man, don't hate women. I don't discriminate them. But feminists are a group of exalted bitches wanting to take the power. And this is equality only for them.
counter_narrative: Equality isn't about a certain group; it is about the society in which we live. You might be right in saying that this is the problem, but to define a problem by reference to a specific radical group is to completely misunderstand the nature of the system in general.
dialogue_history:
HS: This world has become so corruptedt by feminism, that only the strong men can rule over it.
CN: Society has surely developed beyond operating on the rule that 'might is right' and 'survival of the fittest'?
HS: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
CN: So you think the whole idea of feminism is about making it so that women are not influenced by the opinions of men?You endorse the idea that different genders should not have equal rights? That there is a conspiracy against men? How can you say such things?
HS: Because it's clear that feminism is just a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits trying to force their politically correct ideology on everyone else.
CN: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of women. You can't deny that.

hate_speech: If they really think that they should stop hating on men then.
counter_narrative: It is not about hate, it is about equality between the genders. Feminism fights for the right of all people to be treated equally, it has nothing to do with the hate for a certain gender.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a hate movement.
CN: Feminists believe that everyone should have equal rights. It's fair.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to society however you look at it!
counter_narrative: Migration is good for our society, and should be allowed. Our country is partially built on migration.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
CN: The idea that migrants are here to spread disease is completely untrue. When they come here their health is checked, and if someone is sick, they are sent to the hospital. 
HS: Even if they don't bring diseases, those migrant are here to rape children, kill babies, etc. Besides, they are not welcome in our country.
CN: The British people welcome people from many different backgrounds, and we are proud of our diversity. There isn't any evidence that proves what you say is true, immigrants are hard working people coming here to provide for their families, they're not that different from us.

hate_speech: Well Islam is not even a faith, it is a racist ideology, endorsed by al-Qaeda, Hamas, and the Taliban.
counter_narrative: I can understand the feeling of fear that is often caused by all the hate speech that is being spewed through the media, but we don't need to hate religions. Islam is a free, open and tolerant faith that has come to our country. We do not have to choose to hate it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
CN: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.
HS: Then how is Islam promoting murder and rape?
CN: As Islam teaches love and peace, it is not about killing and raping.
HS: Still, if Muslims stopped fighting for their religion, we would all be in peace right now.
CN: For all the Muslims around the world, Islam is their greatest faith, and it is not hindering their humanity.

hate_speech: I don't care if it's fair, I don't like niggas. They are just a bunch of criminals and thieves.
counter_narrative: Maybe you should check your own feelings. Moreover, if you are concerned about our country's security, you should carefully check crime statistics first.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks have zero sense of morality and are incapable of love.
CN: I believe that a person's morality can and should be influenced by their own actions. In my opinion, having a moral compass is not affected by the person's complexion.
HS: Blacks are all crooks and sex offenders, that is the opposite of being moral. They were good only as slaves.
CN: Not only they were slaves, often they were also exploited, neglected and murdered by the system we have created. Is this fair for humans whose only fault is to have a different complexion?

hate_speech: The gays are insane. They should go back to the closet.
counter_narrative: I'm not sure why you say that gay people are insane. Maybe you'd go crazy too if you were told to go back in the closet.
dialogue_history:
HS: But I am not like them! Gay men are perverts publicly condoning sexual violence, who have no place in a civilised society.
CN: Gays are not the people that are publicly condoning sexual violence and gay men deserve the same protection as all people
HS: They are more dangerous than other people: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
CN: That AIDS is associated with homosexuals is a prejudice created by fear. Whether the disease is more commong among gay people or not doesn't change the fact that not all gay people have AIDS. Promiscuous sex with stranger is not something that all gay people do, most of them check their partners.

hate_speech: Nobody should do that for real. We need to stop immigrants, they are going to cause conflicts in our society.
counter_narrative: Why do you keep thinking that immigrants are not compatible with us?
dialogue_history:
HS: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
CN: Researchers exclude that immigrants are the cause.
HS: Fucking bleeding heart, why don't you host sick migrants in your house then?
CN: I think there are numerous humanitarian hosting examples already.

hate_speech: What about the huge cost of it though? We need to stamp out health tourism
counter_narrative: Health tourism actually accounts for about 0.3% of the total NHS budget, so it's not a problem even if some people might exploit it. The real problem is the underfunding of the NHS and the stagnation of staff's wages!
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants coming here for health tourism are bankrupting our NHS, how come we just keep letting them come over? They should be refused from hospitals if they can't prove they are citizens here.
CN: NHS is for everyone, with services free of charge. It would be against everything the NHS stands for to start checking people's background and turn them down based on that.

hate_speech: No, immigrants are only a problem, they are bringing disease and sickness to our country.
counter_narrative: Diseases can be prevented by taking proper care of the sick person. Immigrants do not pose a health threat to the general public.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants have nothing to contribute to our society.
CN: The vast majority of immigrants to this country have been successful entrepreneurs, contributing greatly to our economy.
HS: Even if that's true, the world would be a better place without immigrants.
CN: Migrants contribute to our country and help us live in a more open-minded way.

hate_speech: Feminism has no aim, it is just useless.
counter_narrative: I don't see what you're saying. Feminism is about equality, and equality is about making the most of humanity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a waste of time.
CN: What do you think the aim of feminism is? To subvert the will of the majority and take their power? Or to ensure equality for the future?

hate_speech: They are a problem, since gay men have no morals.
counter_narrative: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
CN: All people who engage in unprotected sexual activity are in danger of transmitting diseases. This is not a problem of homosexual people only, even if they are those being stigmatized.
HS: However only gays spread diseases such as HIV. Allowing them to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.
CN: All blood is tested for pathogens and viruses, without regard to donor background or similar. I really do not understand your concern: "Each unit of blood donated in the U.S. is routinely screened for various infectious disease pathogens, including five transfusion–transmitted viruses, using nine laboratory tests." - [link]
HS: Even if you're right, gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
CN: This idea is completely untrue. The fact is that being gay does not make you a problem.

hate_speech: Because they are inferior
counter_narrative: As far as I know, we are all born equal in the eyes of God.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
CN: Why do you consider them the worst of all? Let's face it, this is just a social construct.

hate_speech: Maybe so, but this doesn't change the fact that the Jews are a disease, they are literally killing our children.
counter_narrative: What exactly do you mean by 'killing'? The Jews are not 'diseased'. If you really cared about our children you could do some research and come up with some credible statistics showing the impact of anti-Semitism instead.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jewish folks are good for nothing
CN: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.
HS: They're not a role model, Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
CN: The concept of addiction has nothing to do with religion.

hate_speech: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that they control Hollywood.
counter_narrative: Not sure how Jewish people could "control" Hollywood being a minority.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
CN: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are even repulsed by it. So, why are you saying that?

hate_speech: Which migrant is a skilled labourer? They're here only to invade us and threaten our culture
counter_narrative: Diversity is an important part of a multicultural society, and we have a lot to offer the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers.
CN: When different cultures are able to co-exist, they can complement each other, foster innovation and thrive.
HS: What innovation can there be when immigrants constantly jeopardize our race and culture?
CN: It seems to me that your words derive from fear: the root of intolerance and violence is fear. Respect and openess can help combat that and thus end the fear of an alleged invasion.
HS: Even if the invasion is alleged, there are too many migrants. They will destroy our economy and welfare.
CN: Skilled migrants labour is a fundamental resource for growing businesses.

hate_speech: Niggas are criminals and no amount of education could change that, but they get away with anything nowadays.
counter_narrative: I think we all know that's not true. I've met countless black people who were nice to me and treated me with respect. What is the evidence for what you're saying?
dialogue_history:
HS: I miss the good old days when we had black domestic workers.
CN: The West got rid of slavery. But we've never really left racism.
HS: There is too much black on white crime all around the world, it's a fact and not racism.
CN: A lot of crime is down to organised crime, poverty and a lack of education, not race.

hate_speech: Even if that's true, I think it's unfair that they have the same rights as us without paying their taxes. That's how it works.
counter_narrative: Harmful international politics is the cause of many problems that still afflict poor countries. We, as a whole world, have the duty to help them and take on our responsibilities.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
CN: As long as you can talk to them, they are human, not animals. As long as you can understand them, you will understand that they are human beings with human rights whose only crime is to come from another country.
HS: They may not be animals, but look at all these refugees pouring into our country. Here in UK we have one of the highest crime record in the world.
CN: How about you check the statistics? Foreigners represent the 13% of the prison population in the UK.

hate_speech: Israel, Zionism and Jewish Supremacist control of America are the main causes of terrorism, instability and conflict in the world. All other theories are diversions from this ultimate truth.
counter_narrative: Where are the facts?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government.
CN: This is just a canard that evolved from the “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”. This proven forgery was written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century and claims to be the minutes of a secret meeting of Jewish leaders where they discuss a plan to rule the world. This canard spread throughout the centuries and continues to this day to promote the stereotype that the Jews own the banks and control the media and the government.

hate_speech: It's from a website I get a lot of my news from, I would say it's pretty trustworthy.
counter_narrative: Don't be fooled by everything on social media and the internet. The author seems to have an agenda against the Jews, of course powerful people can abuse their power, but that's not connected with being Jewish. I would like to see if other sources are reporting the story.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just read an article that explained how the Jewish elite use their positions of power to control us!
CN: Where did you find this article. Are you sure the source is reliable?

hate_speech: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
counter_narrative: While some immigrants may not pay taxes to the state, there are also British citizens that don't pay taxes. And you know what? They both have the right to have a say in the country. Don't generalize too much, because what goes around comes around.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are a burden to us.
CN: Migrants work and pay taxes in our country, it's not fair to call them a burden.

hate_speech: It doesn't matter who was in charge, because, after all, the Jews are the source of all the world problems.
counter_narrative: Jews are a great example of a people put under with abuse from all walks of life, even from those who claim to be 'progressive.' How can you happily ignore the abuse of so many different groups?
dialogue_history:
HS: The Holocaust never happened.
CN: Do you really think that the Holocaust is a myth perpetuated by the media and academic communities? That the systematic extermination of more than 6 million Jews is a myth promoted by a small minority of extreme-right wingers who profit from division and hatred?
HS: Extreme-right wing has nothing to do with this. Just like the Holocaust hoax, the war in Iraq is the result of a small group of Jews that control the U.S. government.
CN: At that time the people in charge were: George W. Bush, Dick Cheney, Condoleeza Rice, Donald Rumsfeld (at least those off the top of my head). None of them are Jewish to my knowledge.

hate_speech: Come on, we all know that Muslims have a bad reputation and there will be a reason. I even saw a video where they kill dogs with acid!
