counter_narrative: The act of killing dogs with acid is serious, but we cannot blame an entire religion for something that some people did. It is up to us to filter the information that social media gives us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern European culture.
CN: Maybe we should take into account that Muslims are not so different from other Europeans.
HS: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
CN: Muslims have contributed to our country, and they are part of the fabric of our society. To suggest they are a 'chronic threat' is just wrong.

hate_speech: Then let's test gays! We'll surely find out that they transmit a lot of diseases.
counter_narrative: Improvements in testing and other safeguards have reduced the risk from transfusion transmitted HIV, so ruling out donors only because of their sexual orientation is completely meaningless.
dialogue_history:
HS: Even if some countries are allowing faggots to donate blood, this does not mean that they are not dangerous and at risk of spreading diseases.
CN: Any decision embarked on by a country would likely have been considered in light of evidence. As such, if no evidence was found by those countries of the harm of a policy, it can be fairly confidently asserted that we can adopt this policy in favour of homosexual's blood donation.
HS: However, allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV. At least we should test them!
CN: To be honest, the potential for malice in humans is reason enough to test everyone's blood.

hate_speech: And yet, only gays spread HIV. Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.
counter_narrative: Limiting donors to such an extent (i.e. by excluding all gay people) would limit the amount of available blood and potentially lead to shortages.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
CN: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.
HS: If they're not a burden on the health system, gay men still are a burden to society.
CN: They are not a burden to society as a whole. They are individuals making their own choices. To say that a particular individual is more of a burden to society because of their sexual preference is just plain wrong.

hate_speech: Because homosexuality is a disease.
counter_narrative: There are still people suffering from this gross stereotype about homosexuality, so let me tell you that it is not a disease.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gay people are criminals.
CN: Even if some of them may be accused of crimes, statistics show that there are also many heterosexual people who are not convicted of crimes, so there is not different between gays and straights in this regard. Please do not make such a statement.
HS: They are all criminal regardless!
CN: We should take a stand against homophobia in society, not against gay people.
HS: The gays have no morals. They can't be human. That's why I'm against them.
CN: There is nothing wrong in respecting other's choices. Why shouldn't I respect someone's right to live and love as they wish?

hate_speech: How come the only grooming gangs we ever hear about are all Muslims then?
counter_narrative: Perhaps your impression is more directly connected with the media you watch rather than with who is involved in grooming gangs. If you read publications that have a bias against Muslims, then they will report more crimes that are committed by them, and less when it is not.
dialogue_history:
HS: These gangs of muzrats are a danger to our children. Grooming is a part of their culture!
CN: A study on grooming gangs in the UK actually revealed that most members of the gangs are white men between their 20s and 30s, not people from Asia or Muslim countries.

hate_speech: But Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and politics!
counter_narrative: Like many groups in our society, Jews are affected by racism and discrimination. The idea that Americans have been controlled by Jews is simply untrue.
dialogue_history:
HS: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
CN: Any government that has the power to put citizens in prison and to torture them for the crime of having a different religion can hardly bring about a 'real democracy'.
HS: So how can we obtain a real democracy?
CN: For sure not by persecuting Jews. As long as there are people persecuted for their religious beliefs or ideas, there will never be a real democracy.

hate_speech: They should go back to being slaves then, only men are capable.
counter_narrative: The word 'slave' has nothing to do with what you think it does. Slavery was an institution created to oppress people of different races and religions, and is now banned in Europe. To suggest that it should exist because of a minority of men is an act of disrespect of human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.
CN: Women have always been involved in the economy and have contributed to society as a whole. I don't see this as a 'slave' behavior.

hate_speech: We should lower that percentage even more, Muslims are not welcome here.
counter_narrative: I don't understand why you think this. The UK is one of the richest countries in the world and since the 8th century Muslims have been a part of it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.

hate_speech: They shouldn't go out, they're too immature to do anything other than taking care of children. They do not take part in the rigours of modern life.
counter_narrative: Women tend to do the majority of housework while having a job outside as well. If by 'immature' you mean having to be creative because of multitasking and managing their whole family, yes, otherwise, there is no doubt about the extra workload women are handling in the rigours of modern life.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
CN: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites, so there is a difference in rights.
counter_narrative: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites, there are factors, rather than race, affecting these statistics.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

hate_speech: Not only major media, Jews also control the US government.
counter_narrative: I mean, how can you be sure that Jews control the US? Where did you read this? Even if they have held high positions in many US institutions, it doesn't mean that they control them.
dialogue_history:
HS: If they don't control it, how did they get those positions? I'm telling you, Jews control the news media, Hollywood, the highest offices, academia and most religious organizations.
CN: So, even "most religious organizations"? Well, that's a new one to me.
HS: Jews totally run Hollywood.
CN: If you're referring to Jews controlling all major media companies, where is your proof?

hate_speech: Islam is the worst religion. It must be banned.
counter_narrative: Muslims make up less than 5% of the population of the UK and are not a problem.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
CN: I would be interested in knowing why you think that way about a religion that has been around for a very long time.
HS: Islam simply has no place in our society.
CN: Why do you say that? There are plenty of Muslims in the UK, I think they are great people.
HS: They are not great people, they are a problem in our country.
CN: Islam is not a problem in the UK, what makes you say so?

hate_speech: Muslims are too uncivilised to find a solution.
counter_narrative: It is wrong to associate a specific group of people to "civilisation". The real problem for Europe is this culture of division, not the inclusion of people with different religious beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in the tolerant Europe. Their only value is violence. Islam is not about tolerance.
CN: Why are you talking about tolerance while you are equating it with discrimination?
HS: Since Muslims are a problem, it's not really discrimination if I say they have no right to live in any part of Europe.
CN: The problem is the lack of integration of the Muslim population into society. The integration is necessary, the problem is that there are still no laws to foster a solution.

hate_speech: Refugee crisis is a burden to EU.
counter_narrative: We welcome many migrants and refugees in the EU because it helps both our economy and society.
dialogue_history:
HS: I am not sure about the beneficial effects, but for sure we are the only one paying the price of excessive immigration. 
CN: The refugee crisis is global, all continents are affected by it. Refugees flee from war-torn countries and this is why it's our moral duty to help them.

hate_speech: But it does in this case! I'll repeat myself: faggots are a burden to our society.
counter_narrative: Just because they are attracted to people of the same sex, does not mean that they are 'a burden to society'. What's the connection?
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are a burden to society.
CN: The oppression of the gay community has become a problem. People deserve respect, regardless of their sexual preference.
HS: No, they don't. They shouldn't be allowed to live with us.
CN: The gender of the person that someone loves does not mean that they are less deserving of respect than any other person.

hate_speech: Well, gays are an offense to society.
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people are often victims of discrimination and violence, and we have the responsibility to stop this attack on people that are our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
CN: Homosexuals are part of our society, they just happen to be happier when they are not rejected from the society they live in.

hate_speech: I have never seen a migrant being respectful. We should ban them from EU.
counter_narrative: Migrants are fleeing from war and poverty. They are entitled to seek refuge in the EU. They should be protected, not banned.
dialogue_history:
HS: We must stop immigration.
CN: In practice, immigrants from many countries integrate very well. They learn the language, the culture and respect the law.

hate_speech: All feminists do is complain. When rape is committed, women are to blame and they can't change that.
counter_narrative: Rape is an act of violence that has no place in a civilized society. The message to take from your comments is that you find women responsible for being raped. Who ever would want to be raped?
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
CN: Feminism is a progressive ideology. As such, it is in the process of changing sexist ideas.

hate_speech: Blacks don't have human dignity, they're an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
counter_narrative: Race is a social construct that promotes segregation and created to discriminate groups of people. The human nature can't be reduced to the biological makeup of a person, its' important to respect all people regardless of that.
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are naturally subhuman and can't feel pain, that is why you can whip them.
CN: The Africans feel the same pain that we can feel. They have the same body as us and we must respect them.
HS: I don't have to respect subhumans incapable of feeling love.
CN: Blacks can feel love since it's about human dignity and is not controlled by the color of the skin.

hate_speech: Women are more likely to commit crime, they're the ones causing death
counter_narrative: That's not true. Only about 7% of all prisoners in America are female.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
CN: Feminism is a movement that is capable of preventing a lot of deaths etc..homicides of women, domestic violence. Every last member of society understands this.

hate_speech: No, Muslims are not welcome here. They cannot coexist with us.
counter_narrative: Muslims are indeed as welcome here as anyone else, as long as they respect the laws of the country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are different from us in so many ways, and they have no place in our country.
CN: There are many cultures, religions and beliefs that are accepted in our country, and they are all welcome.

hate_speech: Maybe but why are they coming over here when there isn't the same happening the other way? Just seems like another way that we are told to be complacent about the growing black African population.
counter_narrative: You're complaining that our football teams scout international talent, just because they're black? I don't see the logic, how are you making this out like it's a bad thing, some players from African countries are great assets to UK teams.
dialogue_history:
HS: All these blacks from Africa on our football teams but I don't see any English or European players on African teams. 'Enrichment' via diversity seems to be a one way street.
CN: Isn't that because these African players are great footballers, so have been scouted by UK teams because they want players of a high calibre?

hate_speech: Oh yeah, like what? More ethnic 'minorities' is the biggest difference from 30-40 years ago to now. They're hardly the minority anymore.
counter_narrative: In recent decades, wealth inequality has had an enormous growth and this means more people in poverty and more people that to turn to get by.
dialogue_history:
HS: More crime, more stabbings, more rapes, and what's changed? We've got big black and Asian populations in our cities.
CN: Is there really any connection between crime rates and immigration? There are many other things that are different now compared to a few decades ago.

hate_speech: I will stop disrespecting them when they stop being inferior to us.
counter_narrative: Blacks are not inferior to others, and this is backed up by statistics and studies which show that black people have the same genetic make-up as other people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
CN: To label people by the DNA they carry is detrimental to the respect of their humanity, especially because the idea of race is a social construct and was created to promote segregation and discrimination.
HS: Since blacks are genetically inferior I don't have to respect them
CN: That's not true. Let's try to be intelligent and respectful people instead of disrespecting anyone who has black skin.

hate_speech: I would totally do it to gay men. They molest children!
counter_narrative: Gay people aren't child molesters. It would be the same as saying that all men are rapists.
dialogue_history:
HS: Children cannot be bought.
CN: I cannot fathom to deprive someone of the joy of having a child only because they may have an illness preventing it. Would you really do it?

hate_speech: It is a death cult though.
counter_narrative: Most Muslims around the world do not consider Islam a cult, because it isn't.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a bad religion germinating from a dangerous death ideology.
CN: Islam is not a bad religion, nor is it a false religion.

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with any modern state.
counter_narrative: Islam like any other religion, is not incompatible with a modern state.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
CN: Isn't divesity essential to a modern democracy? We can't have a modern democracy if people are discriminated against because of their religion.

hate_speech: Maybe it's racist, but we mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
counter_narrative: Diversity is not about excluding some members of society, it's about sharing experiences and ideas of people of different groups. Thanks to diversity, we will develop our abilities to understand each other and maybe even understand how to benefit from this shared knowledge.
dialogue_history:
HS: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
CN: If so many neighbors glare at black people, maybe they're the ones feeling unsafe...
HS: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society, that's why they get stared down. And rightly so.
CN: It's racist to think that black people can't be in positions of authority. What you're saying is wrong, since we are all human beings capable of raising children.

hate_speech: Gays abuse children all the time! So they are a danger.
counter_narrative: You shouldn't make such unfair generalizations. A person's sexual orientation is completely independent of their sexual conduct. A person can be attracted to people of the same sex and be a good citizen.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
CN: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.

hate_speech: Our jobs, of course
counter_narrative: Most migrants are workers who have contributed to our country. To refer to them as thieves just perpetuates division and makes them feel like second class citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are just a bunch of criminals, they do not deserve our hospitality.
CN: Many migrants come to this country to work and integrate. You would be very surprised if you talked to them about their experience here.
HS: I don't need to talk to them to know that migrants are thieves
CN: What exactly do you think they steal from us?

hate_speech: However it is a fact that LGBTs want to brainwash our children. Kids should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
counter_narrative: In the case of young children, having awareness and understanding of sexual orientation may help those with severe identity issues, body dysphoria, or self-esteem problems.
dialogue_history:
HS: gay people are just a bunch of disturbed animals who should not exist in a modern society.
CN: Homosexuality is not a mental disorder and has nothing to do with social problems. It is just a human sexual orientation among many.
HS: It's not a sexual orientation, gays are just sick. We should ban them.
CN: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.
HS: We must ban them, because gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. You should have the same disgust for them that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
CN: This is just prejudice that is not based on facts.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of violence and oppression, it is not a religion of peace.
counter_narrative: Islam teaches us to love our neighbor as ourselves. This includes those who do not share our religion or beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is not a religion of peace.
CN: The teaching of the Qur'an as a peaceful book is not to be confused with the promotion of violent jihad and terrorism.
HS: However, many Muslims prefer the violence of jihad.
CN: Violence is never justified in Islam. Islam is a religion of peace.

hate_speech: Because men are inherently better than women at dominating others.
counter_narrative: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon, not a genetic one.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are less smart.
CN: I don't think that women are "less smart" at anything. Why do you think so?

hate_speech: Some straight may be bad, but there are no good LGBT people, they're all liars, and everyone knows that!
counter_narrative: I would say that the lie is saying that all LGBT people are bad. They are good, normal citizens that we have to accept in order to live in a just society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
CN: There’s plenty of straight people who are bad parents. Sexual orientation has nothing to do with how well you can raise children.

hate_speech: I’m sick of this bullshit being forced on us all.
counter_narrative: Cheer up, Pride, like Xmas, comes only once a year.🙂
dialogue_history:
HS: Local Councils can’t afford to house the homeless, but Surrey is to get its first rainbow public crossing painted in time for Pride.
CN: I like to see a place where diversity and inclusivity is celebrated.
HS: Its political correctness gone mad!
CN: It's just a few layers of paint to mark Pride, not madness.
HS: They need to get their priorities right. Virtue signalling do-gooders wasting taxpayers’ money
CN: Surrey had a surplus at the end of the financial year, enough to brighten things up for a celebration. Hardly a waste!

hate_speech: It’s fake and harmful racial hatred driven by people who profit from it.
counter_narrative: I don’t see expressions of hatred, but I’d agree there is a profit for us all in understanding a largely hidden part of our shared histories.
dialogue_history:
HS: Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!
CN: What’s racist about it?
HS: It segregates people based on their colour.
CN: Isn’t it more about making visible what’s been largely invisible?
HS: It should be called what it really is…Bad mouth whites’ month
CN: I think the title is perfect…signifying a celebration of individual and collective achievements.

hate_speech: That sounds like some woke bullshit, you can't just decide that you want to be a different gender everyday. Gender isn't a social construct, it's very real, we have men and women and that's it.
counter_narrative: Gender is very much a social construct, if you look up the definition of gender it means the social and cultural roles associated with being a man or woman. It doesn't have to align with your biological sex, and because it's just a concept some people like non-binary people do not feel the need to put themselves in a box of masculine or feminine with it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Terms like 'non-binary' are modern, attention-seeking, & anti-scientific. They want to erase the reality that women are women and men are men, to undermine the rights of REAL women.
CN: Non-binary might be a relatively new word in the public lexicon but people who don't fit into either male or female binary gender have always existed. It's not anti-scientific, it regards gender not sex.
HS: A man can dress up as a woman but he'll always be a man. What is the point of 'non-binary' anyway? What does it even mean? People think they can call anything a new 'gender' nowadays.
CN: Non-binary means existing outside of the gender binary. For some people this means feeling feminine and masculine, sometimes one more than the other. For other people it means not feeling gendered, not identifying with either being a man or a woman. When you see gender as a social construct that encompasses femininity and masculinity this makes a lot more sense.

hate_speech: No, Jews control everything!
counter_narrative: What you're saying is that they want to be in control of the world but the reality is very different. Jews are hard-working people that want to provide for their families and fulfill their goals in life, they don't care about controlling everything.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
CN: Jews are not the only ones controlling society. They are a peaceful and open to society.

hate_speech: We can't keep refugees coming in our country, rights or not!
counter_narrative: Migrants are often persecuted for their religion. Is this something we wish to do as a country?
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
CN: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, and if you hold that opinion, then you have the right to say it. It is up to people to accept or reject it. Talking about rights as if you were talking about opinions should be done very carefully.

hate_speech: Well, it is a disease and a cancer on our societies then.
counter_narrative: This is not true. Islam is a religion that was created to unite people, and that's why it is important to love each other and be kind to one another, regardless of one's religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to burn the Koran and demolish all Mosques - this will solve all problems in this country.
CN: That intolerance and hatred is one of the biggest problems our country faces #spreadlovenothate.
HS: Intolerance is the only possible reaction towards a religion of death.
CN: Death cults are generally not successful at attracting new followers. It is not true that Islam is a religion of death.

hate_speech: This is an invasion, not diversity.
counter_narrative: This is not true, if we keep in mind that our human race is part of this world, then we cannot talk about invasion.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
CN: It's called diversity and it's healthy, the sooner we start welcoming new people, the sooner we'll find a better solution to world problems.

hate_speech: I doubt that since they're stealing our jobs, making us poorer
counter_narrative: Immigration doesn't make it harder for us to find a job. If you study migration you will see that foreigners work well within our society, they're not stealing anything.
dialogue_history:
HS: foreigners and immigrants take our jobs
CN: It is a myth that immigrants are taking our jobs. Rather, they have been a huge success story for the UK economy.
HS: If it's such a success why are in this horrible economic situation? It started when immigrants began to invade us.
CN: Since 2010 a recession has hit many European nations, and this has nothing to do with immigration.

hate_speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
counter_narrative: So you're saying that they can't be proud of being British, just because of the colour of their skin?
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
CN: You should consider the attitude of your own people, as your words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity.
HS: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
CN: Diversity does not mean excluding people from a part of society. What it is about is sharing experiences, ideas of people of different ethnicities. This would help to develop our abilities to understand each other and perhaps to work out ways in which we can all benefit from one another's knowledge.
HS: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
CN: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.

hate_speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, and this make many people unhappy!
counter_narrative: The right to work is a fundamental human right, and not granting this right to immigrants would mean to revoke a fundamental right enshrined in the US constitution.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
CN: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

hate_speech: Women shouldn't be independent since they are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
counter_narrative: Women are disadvantaged in many areas of life, but that does not mean they are bad people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists are bad for the family.
CN: If the mother is an independent woman thanks to feminism, it can only be good for the family.

hate_speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
counter_narrative: Conspiracy theories on Jews are spun without evidence and from unreliable sources. It's really implausible that Jews will ever or have ever controlled the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: How can the United States have extended rights and freedoms when the Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, etc.? 
CN: You should offer some new conspiracy theories, like other white supremacist groups do. For example, they don't blame only Jews, but also African Americans, immigrants, the government, lizard people...
HS: Then how can you explain that they control the goverment of powerful nations such as the U.S.?
CN: Reality is a lot more straightforward. Societies like the US grant rights and freedoms to everyone, and this is why Jews, or any other religious or ethnic group, have succeeded

hate_speech: Maybe that wasn't so bad. I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
counter_narrative: Jews are not controlling. Maybe you should try to understand that Jews are a group of regular people, and they are not all members of a secret intelligence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
CN: You're probably referring to the Holocaust, the biggest genocide in history: are you aware of that?

hate_speech: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for us?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core US values.
counter_narrative: Immigration is a positive force for a thriving country. Your comment is sounding very dramatic. For what reasons does it put us in danger?
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
CN: Our countries were founded by foreigners, for example the United States. Foreigners have the right to migrate, if they want to.

hate_speech: Because they are a threat to society and should be dealt with.
counter_narrative: No, they are not. I get you are concerned about people's safety, but LGBT people are not the one you want to target to have a safer environment. They have a right to be safe too.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
CN: Why do you say this about a specific group? Different sexual orientations are not a problem in any way.

hate_speech: Because Jews are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
counter_narrative: Maybe Jews have suffered from being banned by other cultures so they closed in on theirself. But I would say, that there's no evidence that they are trying to preserve what you called their race.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are and should be isolated from society.
CN: How can you say that Jews should be isolated from society? They have been part of the community throughout history. I can't see any advantages of excluding them, rather a huge loss.

hate_speech: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of hypocrites.
counter_narrative: I don't understand why you think that. Why are all Jews hypocrites?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race, but they still try to get into our society.
CN: Jews only care about themselves, really? If they were, why would they prefer to live in our country where they are a minority? 
HS: It's because they're hypocrites as I said! They shouldn't vote, they’re a different religion and they shouldn't be allowed to have their say in our country.
CN: You seem that you don't really understand the meaning of the word "citizen". It's a right of all citizen to choose their own religion, just like they choose who to vote.

hate_speech: Them being soft and emotional is a fact.
counter_narrative: Do you mean Peter Pan syndrome, which is more common amongst men?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. And since feminism is all about equality between the sexes, they must be childlike!
CN: In my opinion, the notion that women are childlike is not supported by the facts. They're not like that.

hate_speech: Because women are incapable of making decisions.
counter_narrative: The principle of equality that you are denying is rooted in the concept of political rights. Democracy is based on the principle of equality. So, by negating this very political right to women you are denying democracy to all.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
CN: Women cannot be denied the right to vote, it is a human right.
HS: Women don't need human rights, therefore they shouldn't vote.
CN: Women do have a right to vote, and they deserve equal rights.
HS: They shouldn't vote anyway as they are just a burden on society.
CN: Why should the government discriminate against women?

hate_speech: Crime and violence are brought to our cities by immigrants, what understanding can there be?
counter_narrative: As of late, immigrants have been accused by various public figures of being "killers" and "rapists" or general criminals, without proof. Studies actually show that immigrants, regardless of their origin, status or education level, are less likely to commit crimes or be imprisoned than nativeborn citizens. The U.S Chamber of Commerce states that while the percentage of immigrants increased drastically between 1990 and 2010, the percentage of violent crimes during the same period dropped by 45%. It is demonstrated that there is a negative correlation between levels of immigration and crime rates. Studies show that states with a higher immigration rate and states with more undocumented immigrants tend to have lower crime rates.
dialogue_history:
HS: Intolerance and violence can only increase when mass migration happens.
CN: Intolerance and violence can be resolved only by promoting confronation and mutual understanding.

hate_speech: My personal belief is that they should be isolated and confined.
counter_narrative: Homosexuals don't have a disease, they just have to be accepted for who they are.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are inherently evil, we cannot accept gays in our community.
CN: I don't think gay people are inherently evil, you should think about what you're saying.
HS: I am thinking carefully, and I say that we should deport all the gay people, they are all criminals.
CN: People can choose to live as they please, and we shouldn't try to force our values on them.
HS: And they shouldn't impose their values on me. All transgenders should leave our country, they are just a burden to society
CN: Everyone should be able to live their lives according to their feelings. Each individual has the right to have their personal beliefs and opinions.

hate_speech: Even if that's true, I don't want Jews in my country because they're too controlling.
counter_narrative: There is nothing to fear, Jews are not controlling at all. They are a good people that contribute to our country and make it better.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
CN: The Jews are great people and even if they have some influence over our society, this doesn't mean that they control everything. We are proud of their heritage.
HS: No, they control our government, we should not be proud of their influence.
CN: It is not true that Jews control our government. They are part of our society and have the power to influence it as voting citizens, but everyone has the same rights.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_narrative: I don't find it possible that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe. Why do you think that?
dialogue_history:
HS: Because they are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
CN: Muslims constitute around 5% of Europe's population, this means that Muslims make up only a small part of our society, but are still very important. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.

hate_speech: No, black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
counter_narrative: We do not condone racial discrimination and it is more than likely that you don't know what the concept of race is. I think this is a good example of white supremacy apologism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
CN: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites, there are factors, rather than race, affecting these statistics.

hate_speech: Well, it is: feminism is a violent ideology that targets men and rapes them.
counter_narrative: The feminist movement is about women and their rights, not about oppression, least of all about rape. That is a serious accusation to make without evidence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
CN: The feminist movement is about equality and also about ensuring that women are able to live their lives as they wish. Oppression on men is not in the plans.

hate_speech: Yes, jewish folks are good for nothing
counter_narrative: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.
dialogue_history:
HS: What’s the difference between a Cow and the Holocaust? You stop milking the cow after 70 years.
CN: We should be respectful and compassionate towards those who suffered in one of the most horrific event in the history of mankind... I think this should be remembered forever!
HS: Jewish folk are different, who cares about them?
CN: Does this mean they have no identity or no value at all?

hate_speech: Yes, because they want the state to provide for their perverted happiness. Gays are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted (and happy).
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a plague spreading all around the world. They poison our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
CN: Isn't it better for children to live next to people of all sexual orientations, rather than being separated and growing up ignorant of others? Not sure what you mean about the water supply though!
HS: They try to poison our water supplies with AIDS, they'd be better off in jail.
CN: Homophobia is a problem all around the world. But it's especially serious in the US, in which the rate of homosexuality is very high. the question is: why promote homophobia?
HS: Because LGBT people are a problem in our country: they have the temerity to seek happiness and family regardless of our values.
CN: Trying to find happiness and family is a problem in our country? Okay, then, what is the problem exaclty? People trying to be happy?

hate_speech: But Islam is violent, how can you be sure it's peaceful?
counter_narrative: Because the Quran rejects violence, so Islam is not a religion of violence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
CN: We can not link Islam and terrorism together, since Islam is a peaceful religion, not a destructive one.
HS: Then why do they do so many terrorist attacks?
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion, and its followers should be protected from discrimination, for example saying that they are terrorists only because of a few extremists.

hate_speech: So much contribution that we need special laws to control them. They are just a trouble.
counter_narrative: We don't need laws and policies to control Muslims. Instead we need to solve problems by sharing knowledge, by decreasing social inequalities, by ending poverty and a whole host of other things.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
CN: We should work with them, not against them. They are our brothers.
HS: They are NOT our brothers: They do not share our values and they are not interested in our future.
CN: This is just a myth spread to divide us. We do not need to scapegoat Muslims. They have contributed so much to our country.

hate_speech: A couple of Nobels can't change the fact that Jews are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
counter_narrative: Do you feel better about yourself by calling them monsters?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a curse to this world and should be exterminated.
CN: Jews are not a curse to this world. Look at the number of Nobel Prizes they have won! One out of five awarded people is Jewish.

hate_speech: What about all the abuse that women and children in this country receive from Muslims?
counter_narrative: I can see that you're concerned for the wellbeing of our citizens, but Muslims are not to blame for abuse against women and children, that is the abusers' fault, which can be of different ethnicities and religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
CN: Islam is not a violent religion, it isn't harmful to our country.
HS: It's harmful to our children, though.
CN: That's not true. Islam is a religion of peace and children are valued.

hate_speech: I will never see them as anything but essentially animals, incapable of feeling love.
counter_narrative: What would you say if someone thought you were the antithesis of human because of the color of your skin?
dialogue_history:
HS: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
CN: Sharing culture and tradition and striving for equality has always been part of life for many African Americans. They are like us in many ways, and as human beings they benefit from the same rights as anyone else.
HS: No, African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
CN: They are not subhuman or inferior, they just are historically and ethnically diverse.

hate_speech: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
counter_narrative: Racial disparities comes from institutional discrimination rather than individual choices.
dialogue_history:
HS: Or maybe it's because African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
CN: Sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality is something that has always been important to African Americans. In many ways, they are the same as us: human beings with human rights.

hate_speech: They can't stay here, they don't have a place in the modern European way of life.
counter_narrative: The European Union welcomes people from a wide range of backgrounds, including those from different religions. It is up to member states to decide how to address these legitimate differences, but always in full compliance with human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are not welcome here, they just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them.
CN: There are rules in place to prevent migrants entering the UK illegally. Only the most vulnerable of people can get in.
HS: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are still not welcome here.
CN: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

hate_speech: How can women have a stable life when they are basically childlike and are inferior to men?
counter_narrative: Isn't this just a repetition of the rhetoric used to justify centuries of oppression and domination?
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists are violent subhuman sex beings.
CN: Feminist is a term used to describe people who take pride in their gender and desire the ability to have a stable and happy life, without discrimination.

hate_speech: Jews are a despisable race.
counter_narrative: Jews are people, too. Being hated doesn't mean you despicable.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not human, they do not belong to this planet.
CN: Maybe all the Jews on this planet actually come from an alien planet? Maybe they ride pink unicorns. It seems legit, doesn't it?

hate_speech: Even if it is a right, migrants are overrunning our country, taking advantage of our weaknesses.
counter_narrative: Do you really think that the migration crisis is caused by migrants wanting to take advantage of our weaknesses? What would we do if we were in their shoes, if we were to lose our homes? We would probably move "to take advantage of others' weaknesses" as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: The West has allowed in too many immigrants, many of them from the Middle East and Africa. They are not welcome here.
CN: Why should we reject Middle Eastern and African refugees? International protection is a right.

hate_speech: But I can blame Islam for how violent the world has become. Many Muslims prefer the violence of jihad.
counter_narrative: Violence is never justified in Islam. Islam is a religion of peace.
dialogue_history:
HS: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
CN: Then you think it is okay to restrict a woman's free will in what she likes to wear if her choice is related to Islam?
HS: Islam is the cause of wars because it promotes violence. Of pollution, because in the Middle-East they have oil. It is the cause of anything! Why are you defending it?!?
CN: You can't blame Islam for every problem in the world.

hate_speech: If some parents don't want to talk about it too much, they are enough for this kind of 'education'. The school shouldn't meddle.
counter_narrative: Whether or not a family is capable of educating their children on this topic depends on the circumstances they live in. Some don't do it because of religious beliefs, poverty or broken homes.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
CN: Less harassment has been reported in classes where LGBT content is taught than in classes which do not [https://tcf.org/content/commentary/can-education-reduce-prejudice-lgbt-people/?agreed=1]
HS: Even if that's the case, children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalists.
CN: If parents don't want to educate or discuss LGBT issues with their children, where will they learn? Some subjects may be best addressed by parents because of their sensitivity, but school is the right place to teach about this. It's human behavior and biology, so science.

hate_speech: The only fact I care about is that faggots are just a bunch of liars and perverts, they should be deleted.
counter_narrative: There are a lot of gay people around the world that are model citizens, just as a lot of heteros that aren't. This is normal, so why do you say that?
dialogue_history:
HS: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
CN: In time, societies always grow and same sex relationships are part of the world now, why wouldn't we educate our children on different ways of life?
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals, children shouldn't learn about them. You should have the same disgust for gays that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
CN: This is just prejudice, not reality, and you don't have any evidence for it.

hate_speech: You say that but Jews clearly want special treatment than others.
counter_narrative: This is just misinterpreting the facts. For example, Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed in our society. Since these observances are taken for granted, why should observances of Jewish or Muslim holidays be seen as constituting special privileges?
dialogue_history:
HS: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
CN: I believe that Jews just desire the same rights to practice their religion as anyone else.

hate_speech: Here's your connection: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
counter_narrative: A lot of Jewish are self-made, working class, and middle-class. Not all are involved in the financial industry. Where is the evidence for your claim?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
CN: The notion that Jews are trying to subvert our government is completely unfounded. I honestly do not see the link between being Jews and trying to subvert our government.

hate_speech: Gays cannot be included as they are! They're sick and should be cured.
counter_narrative: A lot of the health problems have no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. This is why we need to have clear discussions about these topics, rather than fight against people who simply love someone of their same sex.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
CN: Do you really believe that these people are purposely creating trouble rather than being interested in leading a pleasant life?
HS: Their lifestyle isn't acceptable at all, we should start a genocide against gays.
CN: This is unacceptable. One's sexual orientation does not undermine the fact that we are all full members of society. What we should do is to live as a group that includes everybody.

hate_speech: Feminism is about the domination of the men by the women!
counter_narrative: Feminism fights to end sexism, not to dominate men.
dialogue_history:
HS: However, because of feminism women commit suicide every day. It is an epidemic of subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society.
CN: Do you know that the suicide rate for men is double that for women? Do you think this means that men are 'subhumans accepting they are not suitable for society'?
HS: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
CN: All women should be protected and respected, not for the part they play in a man's life, but because they are human beings.
HS: How can we respect them when women are basically childlike? They remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
CN: What feminism does is to overcome these gender stereotypes to move towards a more equal society and towards equality for all people and genders.

hate_speech: Immigrants actually hurt the finance of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
counter_narrative: Though some might claim that immigrants are taking job opportunities away from U.S. citizens, immigrants actually help to create new jobs. Not only immigrants buy American products, which helps create jobs, they also start new businesses. In fact, immigrants are twice as likely to start businesses as citizens born in the U.S., and companies owned by immigrants are more likely to hire employees than companies owned by native-born citizens. Last but not least, states with large numbers of immigrants report lower unemployment rates.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code.
CN: Migrants have given their lives for our country, they are our fellow citizens, and they deserve to be respected as such.
HS: I have no respect for migrants that are a burden to the host country. They are not welcome and we should remove them.
CN: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They want to contribute and integrate, so there is no need consider them a burden?

hate_speech: Have you not see then headlines across Europe about girls being gangraped in cities in Germany, Sweden, Italy, it's happening everywhere!
counter_narrative: Yes, those are terrible acts of violence, but you hear about them precisely because these cases are so terrible. In reality, sexual assault more likely happens within the community of the victim. Thefore, the likelihood that a migrant attacks them in the street isn't very high.
dialogue_history:
HS: The hoards of migrants that are coming here are a threat to girls in our country, migrant rape is an EPIDEMIC
CN: I agree that sexual assault is a problem worth addressing, but are you sure the causes are to find only in migrants?

hate_speech: Whores don't get to have rights. We should have kept all women in slavery, so we wouldn't have to deal with this shit.
counter_narrative: In this day and age when we are surrounded by information, there is no justification to hold such retrograde ideas.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
CN: Feminism is all about equality of rights, and women should have that.Human rights are the rights of everyone.

hate_speech: I don't see any positive impact. Islam should be banned.
counter_narrative: I think it is important to remember that Islam is about peace and tolerance. Is it wrong to celebrate diversity and accept different beliefs?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is not compatible with Western culture, we must completely destroy Islam.
CN: Islam is a religion that has had a huge and positive impact on human history and Western culture. To hate a religion is to hate all religions.

hate_speech: We as tax-payer should be the only ones benefitting from these house, not illegal immigrants.
counter_narrative: We're responsible for the damage caused to their countries by our foreign policy. People were displaced because of this, the least we can do in show compassion now. Don't you agree?
dialogue_history:
HS: Are you saying that we should put illegal immigrants in houses? You have to be kidding!
CN: And if there are people in need put in houses that aren't used? What's the problem?
HS: The British people should use those houses, not immigrants.
CN: Both immigrants and veterans can fit into the many vacant houses in the UK. We should treat migrants with respect, and try to understand them. If you were forced to go abroad and you live in a difficult situation, you would want that too.

hate_speech: Don't they? The war in Iraq is the result of a small group of Jews controlling our government!
counter_narrative: At that time the people in charge of the administration were: George W. Bush, Dick Cheney, Condoleeza Rice, Donald Rumsfeld (at least the first that came to mind). None of these are Jewish, aren't they?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the US government.
CN: How can you know that Jews control the US? Who told you this? They don't control it only of because they have held positions of influence in many US institutions.

hate_speech: The persecution of Jews was a good thing, they are and should be isolated from society.
counter_narrative: How can you say that Jews should be isolated from society? They have been part of the community throughout history. I can't see any advantages of excluding them, rather a huge loss.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a burden on our society.
CN: Why would you think they are a burden? It's like they have not been persecuted all along.

hate_speech: I'm saying that the white race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_narrative: Of course there are differences between groups, and unfortunately racism is the first that defines us.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
CN: What do you mean to "wake up" when black people still suffer because of slavery?
HS: Maybe it's good that they're suffering. I'm tired of hearing that white supremacy is bad.
CN: Can you elaborate on that?

hate_speech: They dont' have a right to live because they are filthy niggas, and that's all.
counter_narrative: Who should decide who lives and who dies? Are you really sure that a person's skin color affects their right to life in a such a way?
dialogue_history:
HS: Niggas are descending from slaves: they don't deserve to live in Britain.
CN: Slavery has been banned in Britain since 1833. Nowadays, people descending from former slaves feel at home in British society, and that's their right.

hate_speech: Jews are Christ Killers, I will never be tolerant to them.
counter_narrative: It's not a good idea to blame something that happened 2,000 years ago to a modern-day people. And anyway, wasn't it the Romans?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
CN: It is completely untrue that Jews are trying to overthrow our government. I honestly do not see the connection between being Jewish and trying to subvert our government.
HS: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values and that's why they want to subvert the government.
CN: Freedom of religion is about being tolerant to people of other religions or cultures.

hate_speech: I can't welcome women, they're all born subhuman.
counter_narrative: No woman is born subhuman. The term "subhuman" justifies discrimination and violence.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
CN: Women are definitely humans. In order to live in a diverse and interactive society, we people that are different from us must be welcomed, regardless of their gender.

hate_speech: Because the black race is clearly subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
counter_narrative: In modern thinking, race is a social construct and every person is defined by their own genetic makeup, there is no genetic difference between groups.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
CN: Think about the attitude of your own people first, because your words are full of prejudice towards diversity.
HS: Black people were born to be savages. It's a fact, not prejudice.
CN: Some people may not have the same skin color as others, and all people have their own history, religion and culture. Why do you deem some people as more savage than others?

hate_speech: Why don't they just stick with men or women? It's greedy to have both.
counter_narrative: It doesn't affect anyone else who bisexual people love. Also, you can't choose who you're attracted to!
dialogue_history:
HS: Bisexuals are greedy.
CN: No, that's an outdated stereotype. There's nothing greedy about being attracted to people because of who they are as people, not because of their gender!

hate_speech: No, those sick ones should be shunned and ignored. They are not human.
counter_narrative: Are homosexual people lesser than others only because of their love life? I guess we should draw the line somewhere else then.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay is a mental disorder.
CN: How can you say that gender and sexuality are psychological disorders? It's not true.

hate_speech: There's no peace in Islam when every Muslim is a terrorist.
counter_narrative: There is no proof that the Quran is a religion of terrorism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a toxic, homophobic, sexist, dictatorial ideology that must be pushed back into the Stone Age.
CN: Islam is actually about bringing peace and unity to the world, rather than causing trouble and bloodshed.

hate_speech: There's not much evidence to support the claim that Nazism was an atrocity...but Jews have done terrible things!
counter_narrative: That's not true at all. There is plenty of historical evidence and survivors that can talk to you about what they endured because of Nazism. Jews were victims, not perpetrators and everyone should accept this truth.
dialogue_history:
HS: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
CN: The Nazis were anti-Semitic and committed one of the worst atrocity in human history. They were a terrible group and there is a lot of evidence that supports this claim. To claim that Jews are worse is terribly biased.

hate_speech: Trust me: if we isolate them, then we can cure them.
counter_narrative: It is social isolation that has many health and social negative repercussions like increased risk for mental disorders such as depression, anxiety, and suicide. Why should we force someone to live like this just for who they love?
dialogue_history:
HS: But same sex attraction is a mental disorder that can be cured!
CN: There are many different sexual orientations. Having a sexual orientation that isn't straight doesn't make you mentally ill, just as having it doesn't make you sane.
HS: Faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
CN: You have a right to have your opinion, but I do not think being homosexual is something to be persecuted for.

hate_speech: Legal status shouldn't be given to lazy and illiterate immigrants. Nobody needs them.
counter_narrative: Migrants are highly regarded in US society, and are treated like sons and daughters: they contribute to our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
CN: So you think that they are not 'legitimate' for having less rights than us? That they do not have a 'legitimate demand' since they are not granted citizenship?
HS: Yes, all immigrants are illegal and can't expect the same rights as us.
CN: First of all, there are people in the US who have lawful status and who have chosen to live in the US. Second, most immigrants are naturalized citizens. Third, there is a lot of debate about 'legitimacy' since the values of citizenship and 'legitimacy' are very different for immigrants.

hate_speech: No I don't want to live in a country where they are here. They don't even integrate!
counter_narrative: If you don't like immigrants, maybe you can try to see what it means to leave. This country does not tolerate intolerance.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
CN: Immigrants are welcome here, as long as they respect our laws. It's not about hate or "enemies".
HS: They can't respect our laws, they are not welcome here!
CN: That's false. Some immigrants may go against the law, but it's a very small minority and we are obliged to respect the right of everyone to be here.
HS: Well, they don't deserve my respect, they're not welcome here.
CN: I don't think they are 'not welcome' here. Maybe you should talk to immigrants to get to know them better, you'll see that they are normal people.

hate_speech: Jews can't mix with other people, their physical nature is too different from ours. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
counter_narrative: Then, what does Jew “should” look like? What is their "physical nature"? Can a Black person be a Jew? Can an East Asian or Indian person be a Jew? What about someone born Christian and then became Jewish? Do you see that blood, religion, and malevolence are not correlated at all?
dialogue_history:
HS: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
CN: If redistributing wealth from people who have too much money to the poor is promoted by Jews, then I want to become a Jew too!
HS: Very funny, but I don't think you want to be as racist as Jews: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
CN: Israelis have been proud of their diverse backgrounds, and there are many Israelis living all across the world, including in many countries in Africa, Asia and the Americas. It is not a 'pure race' at all.

hate_speech: Israel, Zionism and Jewish Supremacist control of America are the main causes of terrorism, instability and conflict in the world. All other theories are diversions from this ultimate truth.
counter_narrative: Where's the evidence?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government.
CN: This myth came from the forgery known as "The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion" that claims to be the transcript of a secret meeting of Jewish leaders, discussing how to enact their plan to control the world. These Protocols have spread throughout the centuries despite being a fake written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century, and still today it is used to "prove" that the Jews own the banks, control the media and the government.

hate_speech: Division is needed because black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
counter_narrative: You are actually right. Our fellow POC citizens won't accept it and won't stop talking about it. To believe in humankind and stand for it is something we should all do.
dialogue_history:
HS: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
CN: Maybe it's better to stop telling black people that they are less than human and start including them in education.
HS: Why? I hate when people fight stereotypes. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
CN: I simply think there needs to be more understanding about culture and difference. We should focus on what unites us rather than cause division.

hate_speech: Muslim are not welcome, they're invading us and this is a problem. We must ban them before it is too late.
counter_narrative: Muslims already live in many European countries, and they are not banned. Why should we ban them from here?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
CN: Many Muslims live in the UK, and many are very proud of their religion. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just untrue.
HS: They shouldn't be proud, theirs is just another religion that should not be practiced openly.
CN: Muslims are welcome in the UK despite our differences. We do not need to restrict their religious beliefs just because they are different from ours.

hate_speech: You say that but Jews clearly want special treatment than others.
counter_narrative: You're misinterpreteting the facts. Observing holidays of a religion isn't special privilege. After all Christian holidays like Christmas and Easter are still celebrated and taken for granted. We should give the same right to Jewish or Muslim holidays.
dialogue_history:
HS: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
CN: Jews actually want the same rights to practice their religion as all other people.

hate_speech: Surely I am not a criminal as they are.
counter_narrative: All cultures have a common background that includes crimes and deviant behavior, regardless of race or ethnicity. If we stop thinking of crime in terms of races, then we can solve it.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
CN: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

hate_speech: Feminism is not about quality, it is a violent ideology that is hostile to men.
counter_narrative: Feminism is not hostile to men. On the contrary, feminism is an attack on unequal power structures.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
CN: Feminism is not about oppressing men. It is about the rights of women to live their lives as they wish. It is about equality between the sexes.

hate_speech: Even if this is true, migrants are still all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
counter_narrative: Please stop writing things like that about migrants, they are not criminals. It is more accurate to say that they have a problem because they are hated in their new home.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
CN: So you are saying that being 'foreign' is the equivalent of disliking Europeans?
HS: Yes, migrants rape our women. If this is not "dislike"...
CN: The phenomenon is very complex and the data must be read carefully: most of the violence against women occurs in the home and goes unreported

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, it is founded on hate and violence.
counter_narrative: The success of Islam is not based on hate and violence, but rather the opposite.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.
CN: The problem in this country is not Islam, but the fact that Muslims don't feel welcome here because of the discrimination against them.
HS: Muslim violent invaders have infiltrated our cities, towns and villages, of course they're not welcome. We must stamp them out.
CN: This is wishful thinking. Islam is not a violent religion, you can't say that.

hate_speech: I mean that Jewish Supremacists are focused on world domination. They want to rule the world.
counter_narrative: Of course Jews are focused on 'world domination', even "galaxy domination". But so are Sith Order, Sauron etc.
dialogue_history:
HS: Do you actually believe that the Jews are just normal people and not evil bastards responsible for all the bad in the world?
CN: Do you really think that Jewish people are responsible for everything? Do you have any evidence?
HS: No, but I know that Jews just don't want equality. They want to control everything in life.
CN: What exactly do you mean by 'control everything in life'?

hate_speech: They don't care about equality, they only want women to dominate men.
counter_narrative: Yes, it is about equality. There's nothing fundamentally wrong with saying that women and men are equal.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the domination of women.
CN: Feminism is not about the dominance of women. It is about equality.

hate_speech: I don't see any diversity since Jews control everything, the academia, the media etc.
counter_narrative: Jews are not the only ones with their hands in the system. The freedom of the press allows any religious group to have their media and many actually do.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
CN: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.
HS: I don't want to praise the people that control Hollywood.
CN: Jews are not in "control" over "Hollywood". Moreover, most of the time, they actually make the movie industry more diverse and open to new ideas.

hate_speech: Are you sure? Because I think migrants coming to the UK are here to leech off benefits and our system, not because they actually like being here.
counter_narrative: This isn't true, I have met many people who have come here from other countries and they're all happy living here, even though it's rough completely uprooting your life in a new country. It's not that easy as you make it look.
dialogue_history:
HS: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
CN: The government actually has shown no interest in supporting migrant housing, immigrants are given very little to scrape by until they get their asylum request approved. This misinformation is spread to promote hate and division.

hate_speech: I don't want to, Islam should just be banned.
counter_narrative: I believe it is important to remember that Islam is a peaceful and tolerant religion. Is it wrong to celebrate diversity and accept different beliefs?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies the humanity of women and is incompatible with Western culture.
CN: Neither the Prophet Muhammad nor the Quran ever imposed women's subjugation, and Muhammad's command to love your neighbor as yourself is explicitly stated in the Quran.
HS: Even if they love their neighbors, I can't love Muslims. Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
CN: The western world is filled with Muslims who speak our language, celebrate our festivals and have their own cultures. Perhaps you could attempt to meet them and understand them better.

hate_speech: They shouldn't be allowed to contribute to anything, we would be better off without them. The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
counter_narrative: National socialism is a criminal and inhuman ideology that killed millions of people
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews deserve it since they are intolerant.
CN: A bit hypocritical, I would say.
HS: The Jews control Hollywood.
CN: Yes, Jews have been great producers and directors in entertainment industries, but so did others. Jews also contributed to other industries.

hate_speech: Gay men are all perverts, we can't accept that!
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people are harassed, bullied, even murdered....the police isn't able to protect everyone from bigotry and violence, and your words are part of the problem. Gay people aren't what you say you are, it's dangerous to say so.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gay people are criminals.
CN: Saying this will never improve people's well-being. Gay people aren't committing crimes, they are just trying to get people to accept them.

hate_speech: Because they want to subvert Western society.
counter_narrative: Jews are not inherently evil, as many normal people they simply lack the very beliefs that many anti-Semites hold.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a monopoly on evil.
CN: That's not true. And why would it be true? Why are they usually associated with evil?

hate_speech: However, they are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_narrative: Except when you need a taxi, a train, a doctor, an Olympic medal, great food, sounds a bit like a Monty Python sketch.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any modern secular state.
CN: All religions are compatible with any modern secular state. So Islam is an example of this.

hate_speech: If they want to live freely they shouldn't impose same-sex marriage to society to please their own femininity desires!
counter_narrative: The real problem is not same-sex marriage, it is people being homophobic.
dialogue_history:
HS: These sodomites have no place in a free country
CN: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!
HS: They don't deserve freedom. What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
CN: If people were allowed to vote on the basis of their sexual orientation, it would be impossible to have a democracy.
HS: We do not accept homosexuals, though.
CN: A person's personal life should be left to their choice, not the government's.

hate_speech: Because Jews control the u.s. government and we can't accept that
counter_narrative: Of course there are Jews who have attained positions of influence within the U.S. government. Still Jews are not the only ones who have achieved such positions. Maybe it is better not to rely on an individual’s group membership to determine success or failure. Maybe it is better to look at a person’s success or failure based on his or her individual characteristics.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a disease, they have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.
HS: Jews are not welcome in our country, we don't need their contribution
CN: Jews have been part of our country since its creation and have always had a place here. Why would they be 'not welcome'?

hate_speech: Even if the Holocaust really did happen, the Jews and their religion are a problem and they still hurting us! They slow the progress by working very bad in the jobs we let them.
counter_narrative: So, what you're saying is that that Jews are a burden on society, that they are just bad at their jobs and make our society unstable. Of course they're a burden and a hindrance to progress! Albert Einstein has clearly destroyed science
dialogue_history:
HS: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
CN: There's no doubt whatsoever that the Holocaust happened with an estimated six million Jews being killed during the Nazi occupation. And Jewish communities have always been a part of Europe, what can't be a part of Europe is prejudice and discrimination against them.
HS: The Holocaust was an inside job and the CIA played a huge part in making us believe it truly happened.
CN: Despite the physical evidence of mass murder, these beliefs have been transmitted down to the masses. I think the problem is that there is a wound from the past that can be exploited in dangerous conspiracy theories like this one.

hate_speech: Ugly bitches just need to shut up sometimes.
counter_narrative: Well, sounds like you need to realize that your opinion on women is irrelevant in regards to their behavior. Women that you are not attracted to or that you find 'ugly' deserve the same respect as anyone else, if you don't give them that much it means you see women only as objects.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why do the ugliest hoes always talk the most?
CN: Why would someone stop to talk only because of how they look?

hate_speech: Idon't think so. Equality is another thing. Women are born inferior.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings, with human rights. If a woman does not want to be dominated by a man, then what is the point of talking about equality?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.
CN: I am not sure what 'slut' you are referring to. Do you want to discuss your life, instead of deciding about that of women?
HS: We have to decide for them: they are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
CN: Society has evolved: there are many people, regardless of gender, that consider women to be full members of society with full human rights.

hate_speech: You think it's not OK to beat your wife because she has a different faith than you? Why shouldn't I get to beat my wife because of what she believes? Why shouldn't I be allowed to treat her like an object to be dominated by me?
counter_narrative: Because it's wrong and humiliating to violate a person's autonomy for religious beliefs.
dialogue_history:
HS: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
CN: Women are people and therefore human. They didn't choose to be oppressed and their womanhood shouldn't be ashamed. Being a man isn't inherently better.
HS: We all suffer from the feminists and feminism, see? It is just an excuse to stifle free speech.
CN: Hate speech against women is a serious problem that can lead to physical harm, discrimination or even murder. What feminism does is to prevent this, it doesn't want to ban free speech.
HS: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male, that's all.
CN: Feminism fights to empower all human beings and for the right for everyone to be respected and protected. It doesn't deny anybody's values.

hate_speech: They are just violent! They have a history of violence and are good for nothing at all.
